subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Basketball
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Griffin of the Clippers and LaMarcus Aldridge of Portland are the two newcomers on the list of 20 players who will be candidates for the American men’s Olympic team.
snippet: Griffin of the Clippers and LaMarcus Aldridge of Portland are the two newcomers on the list of 20 players who will be candidates for the American men’s Olympic team.
